Author: ViceroyInTheMorning
Text: oh my god that made me think about something. When I was like 14 I knew the facebook password of a "friend" and classmate who then changed schools. I sometimes logged into her account (yikes) and she asked another classmate how I was doing and she replied "she's doing fine but she has gained weight again" bruhhhhhhh. Like. Again implies they talked about it before. Not like it would be bad enough otherwise but I guess I deserved it for logging into her account
